thread.title: Overnight on Business
thread.title_full: Overnight on Business - Review of Millenium Hilton, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Chukar2059
title: Overnight on Business
text:
This is a great Hilton near 9/11 memorial with fantastic views of the Hudson and Freedom Tower. Sits right next to St Paul's Church, which was glorious in recent March snowstorm. Front desk staff is great but bar/restaurant are just so-so. Starbucks in the same building on Dey Street side. Westfield World Trade Center directly across the street for anything you may have forgotten - includes an Apple store
Room Tip: hard to have a bad view! See more room tips
